welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Consett, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, sample traditional British cuisine, and experience the warm hospitality of our community. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Newcastle Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
